dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1969
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Highlights the struggle and despair of the times, recounts a conversation on faith with Mike Gold, an old Communist friend. Discourses on penance and voluntary suffering as acts of love that increase hope. Says we each have unique vocations to the works of mercy.
